short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enabling Telegram webApps to run in desktop version of Telegram

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension automatically changes the tgWebAppPlatform parameter to 'android', enabling Telegram web apps to run in the desktop version of Telegram.

Github: https://github.com/vherasymenk0/telegram_webApp_platform_modifier
